reference.title: cxxFunctionReturnDesc
reference.shortdesc: Describes the return value of a function.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFunctionReturnDesc> element is optional within a function definition. It provides a textual description of a function return value.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxFunctionDefinition> <cxxFunctionReturnDesc>The index in the buffer or -1 if not found or i is >= the buffer length. </cxxFunctionReturnDesc> </cxxFunctionDefinition>
